thread.title: Judith M McIntosh
thread.title_full: TheShowerSealShop.com reviewed by Judith M McIntosh

author: Judith M McIntosh
title: Judith M McIntosh
text: We were having such a frustrating time driving around bathroom suppliers trying to find seals for our two showers. Luckily one chap took the trouble to give me your website and since then, everything has gone according to plan. Correct seals arrived and fitted. One of your people even phoned to make sure we had ordered the right thing before sending out. First class website and treatment. Thank you...we can now have guests with impunity.
